page.title: 13FASHION 2
page.content: Many clothes come in fashion every year.Different people wear different clothes and have different tastes.E.g. Trendies usually wear Farah trousers, tracksuits and other sports wear.Mods usually wear bowling shoes,parka jackets and union jack flags.They ride about on scooters.Teddies wear big blopper Timpsons shoes,commonly known as beetle crushers,fluorescent socks and flashy suits.Skinheads usually wear Doc Marten boots,turned up jeans and T-shirts,braces and pilot jackets. By Nikola Wragg and John Fields.
